bio: Experienced Frontend Web Developer focused on smart product engineering using agile methods. With a strong drive for excellence through positive thinking. Well-rounded, culturally aware professional with the ability to relate with diverse clients with various business needs. Highly skilled in solving technical, financial, and business problems for clients. Improving lives one code at a time!

experience.description: I developed ERP console applications using to manage and organize the work flow of staff and customers. Improving productivity and efficiency by 13%

At Freexit Technologies, I was able to develop an ERP (Enterprise Resource Planner) to manage both customers, products, orders efficient using angular best practices with improved performance and load time.
At Slate, I worked on improving the user experience and student report card system that increased the efficiency of teachers to produce student termly report.
I was tasked to develop a nice and interactive UI for agricultural products ecommerce.
